Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.timeseries

Distance functions designed for time series.

See:
          Description


Class Summary
AbstractEditDistanceFunction Provides the Edit Distance for FeatureVectors.
AbstractEditDistanceFunction.Parameterizer Parameterization class.
DTWDistanceFunction Provides the Dynamic Time Warping distance for FeatureVectors.
DTWDistanceFunction.Parameterizer Parameterization class.
EDRDistanceFunction Provides the Edit Distance on Real Sequence distance for FeatureVectors.
EDRDistanceFunction.Parameterizer Parameterization class.
ERPDistanceFunction Provides the Edit Distance With Real Penalty distance for FeatureVectors.
ERPDistanceFunction.Parameterizer Parameterization class.
LCSSDistanceFunction Provides the Longest Common Subsequence distance for FeatureVectors.
LCSSDistanceFunction.Parameterizer Parameterization class.
 

Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.timeseries Description

Distance functions designed for time series.

Note that some regular distance functions (e.g. Euclidean) are also used on time series.
